data.caption: Results For The FY 2022-@3
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed herewith the following documents in terms of Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015:

1. Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2023.
2. Audited Standalone and Consolidated Statement of Assets and Liabilities for the year ended 31stMarch, 2023along with the Cash Flow Statements
3. Auditor's Report on Quarterly and Year to Date Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements of the Company for the Financial Year ended on 31stMarch, 2023 as required under Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015

This is for your information and necessary records.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended 31 March, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 23(9) of t he SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith disclosure of Related Party Transactions for the half year ended 31st March, 2022, in the format prescribed by SEBI vide its Circular No. SEBI/HO/CFD/CMD1/CIR/P/2021/662 dated November 22,2021. Kindly take the same on record

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 31 Deember 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Part A of Schedule III, of the Listing Regulations, we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its 208th Board Meeting held on February 22, 2022, had, inter-alia transacted the following items of the business:

i) Approved the Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the third quarter and nine months ended on 31st Deember, 2021.
ii) Took note of the Limited Review Report on Quarterly Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements of the Company for the quarter ended 31st Deember, 2021, as required under Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Submission Of Un-Audited Financial Results Alongwith Statement Of Assets And Liabilities And Cash Flow Statements Of The Company As Per The Provisions Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed herewith the following documents in terms of Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015:

1. Un-Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results alongwith Statement of Assets and Liabilities and Cash Flow Statements of the Company for the second quarter and half year ended on 30th September, 2021.

2. Limited Review Report on Quarterly Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements of the Company for the second quarter ended on 30th September, 2021 as required under Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015

This is for your information and necessary records.

data.caption:
Disclosure Under Regulation 23(9) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements)
Regulations, 2015 (''SEBI LODR'') - Details Of Related Party Transactions
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations,
2015, we enclose disclosure on Related Party Transactions of the Company for the financial year
ended March 31, 2021, in the format prescribed under relevant Accounting Standards. You are
requested to take note of the above.

data.caption: Submission Of Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended On 31St March 2021
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed herewith the following documents in terms of Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015:

1. Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the fourth quarter and financial year ended 31st March, 2021 along with the Cash Flow Statements.
2. Standalone and Consolidated Statement of Assets and Liabilities for the year ended 31st March, 2021
3. Auditor's Report on Quarterly and Year to Date Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements of the Company for the Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2021 as required under Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015
4. Statement of Impact on Audit Qualification pursuant to SEBI Circular No.CIR/CFD/CMD/56/2016 dated 27th May, 2016.

This is for your information and necessary records.
